Sentece: In children younger than 22 months of age, nadolol is more rapidly eliminated (t1/2 = 4.3 hours or less) than in older children, in whom elimination is more similar to that in adults (t1/2 approximately 7.3-15.7 hours).
Title: Pharmacokinetics of nadolol in children with supraventricular tachycardia.
Name: Nadolol
